Description: Updates the current list of active viewers.
Name: Refresh viewers

Description: Awards all active viewers coins.
Name: Karma round

Description: Gives everyone coins.
Name: Give all coins

Description: Gives a viewer coins.
Name: Give coins

Description: Shows the balance of a given user.
Name: Check user

Description: Sets the current karma for a given user.
Name: Set karma

Description: Toggles coin generation.
Name: Toggle coins

Description: Shows your current balance, karma, and, optionally, the amount of coins earned per cycle.
Name: Check balance

Description: Gives an overview of what karma is in relation to Twitch Toolkit.
Name: Karma explanation

Description: Directs you here!
Name: Purchase list

Description: Adds you to the name queue.
Name: Join queue

Description: Shows you information about Twitch Toolkit.
Name: Mod info

Description: Lets you buy things from the store.
Name: Buy

Description: Lets you wager coins to level up a skill of your choosing.
Name: Level skill

Description: Shows you important settings for Twitch Toolkit, like the karma cap.
Name: Mod settings

Description: Gives you a brief set of instructions on how to use Twitch Toolkit.
Name: Instructions

Description: Shows you the current list of commands, which may or may not be this list.
Name: All commands

Description: Shows you the complete list of installed mods.
Name: Installed mods

Description: A colony wide resurrector mech serum.
Name: Revive all

Description: A personal resurrector mech serum.
Name: Revive me

Description: A personal healer mech serum/
Name: Heal me

Description: A colony wide healer mech serum.
Name: Healall

Description: Shuffles your passions. If a skill is specified, you'll be guaranteed a minor passion in it.
Name: Passion shuffle

Description: Purchases the part specified and queues it for surgery on your pawn.
Name: Surgery

Description: Adds a trait for your pawn.
Name: Add trait

Description: Removes a trait from our pawn.
Name: Remove trait

Description: A resurrector mech serum for a random dead colonist.
Name: Revive any pawn

Description: A healer mech serum for a random colonist.
Name: Heal any pawn

Description: Replaces a trait with a different trait.
Name: Replace trait

Description: It's like buy item, but it gets added to your inventory if possible.
Name: Backpack

Description: Downgrades a skill's passion... sometimes.
Name: Remove passion

Description: Upgrades a skill's passion... sometimes.
Name: Add passion

Description: Heals all healable injuries your pawn currently has.
Name: Full heal

Description: Creates a prisoner rescue quest for your most recent pawn.
Name: Rescue me

Description: Shows your current kill count.
Name: Viewer kill count

Description: Shows your current stats within a given category.
Name: Viewer stats

Description: Shows an overview of your pawn's health. If a capacity is specified, it'll show what's affecting it.
Name: Viewer health

Description: Shows an overview of your pawn's needs.
Name: Viewer needs

Description: Shows an overview of your pawn's gear.
Name: Viewer gear

Description: Shows an overview of your pawn's body.
Name: Viewer body

Description: Shows your pawn's work priorities.
Name: Viewer work

Description: Shows your pawn's bio.
Name: Viewer story

Description: Shows your pawn's current skills and their passions.
Name: Viewer skills

Description: Attempts to relink your pawn to you. (Doesn't work for Puppeteer)
Name: Fix viewer pawn

Description: Attempts to relink all pawns to their respective viewers. (Doesn't work for Puppeteer)
Name: Fix all pawns

Description: Makes your pawn leave the colony.
Name: Abandon pawn

Description: Shows your pawn's relationships to other viewers.
Name: Viewer relations

Description: Shows an overview of the colony's current faction relations.
Name: Factions

Description: Shows the current research progress. If a project is specified, it'll show the progress of that instead.
Name: Research

Description: Shows the first few results for the query in the given category. Valid categories are: 'races', 'traits', 'items', 'events', 'diseases', 'animals', and 'skills'.
Name: Lookup

Description: Similar to the lookup command, except it'll show the price for the first valid match.
Name: Price check

Description: Removes viewers that were stuck in the "game paused" limbo.
Name: Unstick

Description: Toggles whether or not viewers can actively purchase things from the store.
Name: Toggle store

Description: Makes your pawn insult a random viewer. If a viewer is specified, you'll insult them instead.
Name: Insult

Description: Shows the colony's current wealth. This command uses the same value the storyteller will use.
Name: Colony wealth

Description: Shows the current number of colonists remaining in the colony.
Name: Colonist count

Description: Provides some information about supported things. Supported categories are: weapons
Name: Database

Description: It's like unstick, but safe for viewers to use.
Name: Unstick me
